page.title: 18Sport and Recreation.
page.content: In our area we have many forms of recreation. Two of the most popular sports are association football and rugby. There are many local clubs catering for ages 8-adults pontllanfraith A.F.C is the local football club and plays in the welsh league. Blackwood R.F.C is the senior rugby side in the area there are many football grounds in this area we have an indoor swimming pool with sauna and jacuzi and outdoor swimming pool for the summer only. There is a leisue centre where activities such as squash, badminton, table tennis, gymnastics, self defence, arts, Indoor football etc, can be done. We have facilities for golf, tennis, chess and bowling. Recently formed Islwyn Running Club offers facilities for athletes. There is a BMX course for cyclists.
